name: Timespinner
summary: Timespinner is a beautifully crafted story-driven adventure, inspired by classic 90s action-platformers. Join timekeeper Lunais on her quest for revenge against the empire that killed her family, using time-bending powers to explore a vast connected world.
info:
• 发行: Chucklefish
  • 别名: 时间调节器
  • 别名: 时间调停者
  • 别名: 纺时者
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: PSV
  • 游戏类型: Platform
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 2人
  • 发行日期: 2018年9月25日
  • 开发: Lunar Ray Games
